title: Time to Expose Some B Team, Morons. (Janna Damage Buff)
body:
I'm sorry, I don't want to be a pain. But just, why? What's the purpose? I can't see why this is even helpful for Janna, let alone reasonable. I'm just telling you, that your "balancing team" has lost their mind. Are they seriously trying to make her mid lane viable? It could just be me, but I can't see her ever being played mid if that's the aim.
Truth, be told. I don't care, I don't play anymore. But really, damage buff for Janna? If it how you keep the game interesting I will stay quiet.

**Tailwind (Passive)** Bonus movement speed conversion to damage changed from [15/25/35% at levels 1/7/13] to [25/35% at levels 1/10]

I didn't even want to write this but, come on, that's ridiculous. Out of everything so far, that's the most eye-rolling suggestion of a buff I have ever seen. I'm just about calling the team a joke of all balancing in the gaming industry, at this point. If you don't mind, I will call them B team. Because they are far from being anything that could be certified as a, "balancing team".

Definition of balancing:

(It's just a joke, hopefully. There is no way they are mentally imbalanced.)
5: mental and emotional steadiness

(This is the definitions.)
1a: to poise or arrange in or as if in balance
balancing a book on her head
The legislature hasn't balanced the budget in years.
b: to bring into harmony or proportion
I struggled to balance my career and family life.
a balanced diet
c: to bring to a state or position of balance
balanced the scales by adding a little more on one side

https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/balance

replies.body: With mobility boots that's like an extra 20 damage. HOLY SHITTTTTTTTTTT JANNA MID CONFIRMED!!!!!
